chainlink data provider","_previousMonth":"previous month's inflation data"}},"fulfill(bytes32,uint256)":{"params":{"_cpiData":"latest CPI data from BLS called by the chainlink oracle","_requestId":"of the chainlink request"}},"getMonthlyAPR()":{"returns":{"percentageChange":"percentage change in basis points over past month"}},"remainingTime()":{"returns":{"_0":"remaining"}},"requestCPIData()":{"returns":{"requestId":"for this request only allows 1 request per month after the 14th day callable by anyone after time duration","returns":{"_0":"timestamp"}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"CPIMonthlyChangeRateUpdate(int256,int256)":{"notice":"event when the monthly change rate is updated"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"MAXORACLEDEVIATION()":{"notice":"the maximum allowable deviation in basis points for a new chainlink oracle update only allow price changes by 20% in a month. Any change over this threshold in either direction will be rejected"},"TIMEFRAME()":{"notice":"the time frame over which all changes in CPI data are applied 28 days was chosen as that is the shortest length of a month"},"currentMonth()":{"notice":"the current month's CPI data"},"duration()":{"notice":"the duration of the timed period"},"fee()":{"notice":"amount in LINK paid to node operator for each request"},"fulfill(bytes32,uint256)":{"notice":"Receive the response in the form of uint256"},"getCurrentOraclePrice()":{"notice":"get the current scaled oracle price applies the change smoothly over a 28 day period scaled by 18 decimals"},"getMonthlyAPR()":{"notice":"get APR from chainlink data by measuring (current month - previous month) / previous month"},"isTimeEnded()":{"notice":"return true if time period has ended"},"jobId()":{"notice":"job id that retrieves the latest CPI data"},"monthlyChangeRateBasisPoints()":{"notice":"current amount that oracle price is inflating/deflating by monthly in basis points"},"oracle()":{"notice":"address of chainlink oracle to send request"},"oraclePrice()":{"notice":"oracle price. starts off at 1e18 and compounds monthly"},"previousMonth()":{"notice":"the previous month's CPI data"},"remainingTime()":{"notice":"number of seconds remaining until time is up"},"requestCPIData()":{"notice":"Create a Chainlink request to retrieve API response, find the target data, then multiply by 1000 (to remove decimal places from data)."},"startTime()":{"notice":"the start timestamp of the timed period"},"timeSinceStart()":{"notice":"number of seconds since contract was initialized"}},"notice":"contract that receives a chainlink price feed and then linearly interpolates that rate over a 28 day period into the VOLT price. Interest is compounded monthly when the rate is params._fee: maximum fee paid to chainlink data provider

params._cpiData: latest CPI data from BLS called by the chainlink oracle

returns.percentageChange: percentage change in basis points over past month

returns.requestId: for this request only allows 1 request per month after the 14th day callable by anyone after time period and 14th day of the month

timeSinceStart().details: will be less than or equal to duration

MAXORACLEDEVIATION().notice: the maximum allowable deviation in basis points for a new chainlink oracle update only allow price changes by 20% in a month. Any change over this threshold in either direction will be rejected

TIMEFRAME().notice: the time frame over which all changes in CPI data are applied 28 days was chosen as that is the shortest length of a month

duration().notice: the duration of the timed period

fee().notice: amount in LINK paid to node operator for each request

fulfill(bytes32,uint256).notice: Receive the response in the form of uint256

getCurrentOraclePrice().notice: get the current scaled oracle price applies the change smoothly over a 28 day period scaled by 18 decimals

getMonthlyAPR().notice: get APR from chainlink data by measuring (current month - previous month) / previous month

isTimeEnded().notice: return true if time period has ended

jobId().notice: job id that retrieves the latest CPI data

monthlyChangeRateBasisPoints().notice: current amount that oracle price is inflating/deflating by monthly in basis points

oracle().notice: address of chainlink oracle to send request

oraclePrice().notice: oracle price. starts off at 1e18 and compounds monthly

remainingTime().notice: number of seconds remaining until time is up

requestCPIData().notice: Create a Chainlink request to retrieve API response, find the target data, then multiply by 1000 (to remove decimal places from data).

startTime().notice: the start timestamp of the timed period

timeSinceStart().notice: number of seconds since contract was initialized

statements.documentation: calculate new monthly CPI-U rate in basis points based on current and previous month
store data and apply the change rate over the next month to the VOLT price

documentation.text:
@notice get APR from chainlink data by measuring (current month - previous month) / previous month
 @return percentageChange percentage change in basis points over past month

statements.documentation: store CPI data, removes stale data
calculate new monthly CPI-U rate in basis points
pass data to VOLT Price Oracle
compound the interest with the current rate
emit even if there isn't an update
if the oracle change rate is the same as last time, save an SSTORE

documentation.text:
@notice this is the only method needed as we will be storing the most recent 2 months of data
 @param newMonth the new month to store
